lines.instruction: Press enter to feel a warm glow of appreciation...

lines.dialogue: That was quite easy, wasn't it? Don't worry, it will get more difficult later once we've completed the calibration questions. For now, I just have to make sure you're not psychopathic. Remember, if you choose poorly all you've got to look forward to is eternal oblivion. So try to be a good moral arbitration engine now, won't you?
lines.instruction: Press enter to consider how to deal with this information...
